long_description: The Icebreaker Quantum hoodie features the natural abilities of moisture-wicking merino wool to keep you comfortable when running in cold weather. Machine-washable merino wool with a touch of spandex wicks moisture and resists odors naturally, and mesh underam panels enhance breathability. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Zippered chest pocket stores small items and includes a port for your headphones. Thumbholes warm wrists on cool days, and droptail hem increases rear coverage. Reflective zipper and reflective branding enhance visibility in dim light. The Icebreaker Quantum hoodie offers a slim fit that moves with you during activity. Machine washable.
short_description: The Icebreaker Quantum hoodie features the natural abilities of moisture-wicking merino wool to keep you comfortable when running in cold weather.
